general.risk_assessment: Low Risk: Strong fundamentals, worth long-term holding
general.desc: PT DCI Indonesia Tbk is a data center provider in Indonesia. It provides reliable, well networked, and well-managed cloud and carrier-neutral data center infrastructure services in Indonesia. The company operates in two segments which is Colocation services ,Others. The services offered by the company include Colocation, Cross Connect, Flexspace, Smarthands, CloudConnect, and DCI Internet Exchange.

per share rev.name: Revenue per Share
per share rev.details: PT DCI Indonesia Tbk revenue growth has slowed down over the past 12 months.

fscore.details: Piotroski F-Score is 8, indicates a very healthy situation.

mscore.name: Beneish M-Score
mscore.details: Beneish M-Score -2.85 no higher than -1.78, which implies that the company is unlikely to be a manipulator.

operatingmargin.details: PT DCI Indonesia Tbk operating margin is expanding. Margin expansion is usually a good sign.
